value.0:
This widget gives players an ECL corrected XP reward. 

Mind that anyone who gets XP this way is blocked from getting it again for 5 minutes.

How much XP do you want to give the party members of the player?

Mind that this only gives XP to players in this area.

How much XP do you want to give nearby players?

Players who are given XP will get a small visual effect as a notification.
Give the player <CUSTOM5102>50%<CUSTOM5100> of the XP needed for the next level.
